Report.Description: Reporting which shows all software installed and where it is installed. Also shows commercial data elements from hardware asset record such as system name and associated physical location, assigned user and their relevant business unit + financials details
Report.SearchSQL:
-- Avoid locking by allowing result to contain uncommitted rows SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
-- Set the language to us_english so the datetime is consistent SET LANGUAGE us_english
-- Split search words DECLARE @SearchWholeWord nvarchar(max) SET @SearchWholeWord = @SearchText DECLARE @SearchWords table(Word nvarchar(400) PRIMARY KEY) DECLARE @SearchWordCount int IF (@SearchText IS NOT NULL AND @SearchText <> '') BEGIN INSERT @SearchWords SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TableSplitSearchWords(@SearchWholeWord) END SELECT @SearchWordCount = COUNT(DISTINCT Word) FROM @SearchWords
-- Pre-calculate installed software that user is allowed access CREATE TABLE #InstalledSoftwareAllowedComputer (ComplianceComputerID int PRIMARY KEY)
IF (SELECT HasAccess FROM dbo.RightsHasAccess('CMApplications', 'read')) = 1 BEGIN INSERT #InstalledSoftwareAllowedComputer SELECT tcc.ComplianceComputerID FROM TableComplianceComputerCurrentUser(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL) tcc END
-- Pre-calculate computers that user is allowed access CREATE TABLE #ComplianceComputerAllowed (ComplianceComputerID int PRIMARY KEY) INSERT #ComplianceComputerAllowed SELECT * FROM TableComplianceComputerCurrentUser(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)
-- Pre-calculate users that user is allowed access CREATE TABLE #ComplianceUserAllowed (ComplianceUserID int PRIMARY KEY) INSERT #ComplianceUserAllowed SELECT * FROM TableComplianceUserCurrentUser(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 1)
-- Pre-calculate software titles that user is allowed access CREATE TABLE #SoftwareTitleAllowed (SoftwareTitleID int PRIMARY KEY) IF (SELECT HasAccess FROM dbo.RightsHasAccess('CMApplications', 'list')) = 1 BEGIN INSERT #SoftwareTitleAllowed SELECT SoftwareTitleID FROM SoftwareTitle END
-- Limit rows returned if setting is present or provided row limit parameter not null SET @RowLimit = dbo.MinRowLimit(@RowLimit, 'MaxCustomViewResultRows'); IF @RowLimit IS NULL OR @RowLimit = -1 BEGIN SET @RowLimit = 0x7FFFFFFF; END -- Custom view results query SELECT TOP(@RowLimit) results.* FROM ( -- Custom view query for installed software SELECT InstalledSoftware.InstalledSoftwareID AS [InstalledSoftwareID], SoftwareTitle.FullName AS [ApplicationName], SoftwareTitleVersion.VersionName AS [ApplicationVersion], SoftwareTitlePublisher.PublisherName AS [ApplicationPublisher], ComplianceComputer.ComputerName AS [ComputerName], InstalledSoftware.IsUsed AS [IsUsed], InstalledSoftware.LastUsedDate AS [LastUsedDate], ISNULL(InstalledSoftware.InstallDate, InstalledSoftware.DiscoveryDate) AS [DiscoveryDate], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerID], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerName], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_Domain], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_InventoryDate], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_Location], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_CorporateStructure], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_CostCenter], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_Environment], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_OperatingSystem], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_SerialNo], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerStatus], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerType], [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_InventorySourceType], [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_UserID], [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_Account], [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_Email], [R3_89ab5105110ae6c27f20bd79bd7bf388_ComputerToAssignedUser_UserID], [R3_89ab5105110ae6c27f20bd79bd7bf388_ComputerToAssignedUser_Account], [R3_2b3cff0b49a0d1485d14a77b95941767_ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser_UserID], [R3_2b3cff0b49a0d1485d14a77b95941767_ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser_Account], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ApplicationID], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ApplicationName], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Edition], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ProductName], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Classification], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ApplicationVersion], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Publisher], [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Source] FROM InstalledSoftware -- Filter INNER JOIN (SELECT ins.InstalledSoftwareID FROM InstalledSoftware AS ins JOIN #InstalledSoftwareAllowedComputer AS cc ON cc.ComplianceComputerID = ins.ComplianceComputerID) AS filter ON filter.InstalledSoftwareID = InstalledSoftware.InstalledSoftwareID -- Additional joins LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitle ON SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleID = InstalledSoftware.SoftwareTitleID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitle AS SoftwareTitleToVersionLink ON SoftwareTitleToVersionLink.SoftwareTitleID = InstalledSoftware.SoftwareTitleID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitleVersion ON SoftwareTitleToVersionLink.SoftwareTitleVersionID = SoftwareTitleVersion.SoftwareTitleVersionID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitle AS SoftwareTitleToProductLink ON SoftwareTitleToProductLink.SoftwareTitleID = InstalledSoftware.SoftwareTitleID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitleProduct ON SoftwareTitleToProductLink.SoftwareTitleProductID = SoftwareTitleProduct.SoftwareTitleProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitlePublisher ON SoftwareTitleProduct.SoftwareTitlePublisherID = SoftwareTitlePublisher.SoftwareTitlePublisherID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ComplianceComputer ON ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerID = InstalledSoftware.ComplianceComputerID -- Link from InstalledSoftware to Computer LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- Custom view query for computers SELECT ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerID AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerID], ComplianceComputer.ComputerName AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerName], cd.QualifiedName AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_Domain], ComplianceComputer.InventoryDate AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_InventoryDate], Location.Path AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_Location], CorporateStructure.Path AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_CorporateStructure], CostCenter.Path AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_CostCenter], [EnvironmentV].PropertyValue AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_Environment], ComplianceComputer.OperatingSystem AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_OperatingSystem], ComplianceComputer.SerialNo AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_SerialNo], ComplianceComputerStatusI18N.DefaultValue AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerStatus], ComplianceComputerTypeI18N.DefaultValue AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerType], ComplianceComputerInventorySourceTypeI18N.DefaultValue AS [R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_InventorySourceType], [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_UserID], [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_Account], [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_Email], [R3_89ab5105110ae6c27f20bd79bd7bf388_ComputerToAssignedUser_UserID], [R3_89ab5105110ae6c27f20bd79bd7bf388_ComputerToAssignedUser_Account], [R3_2b3cff0b49a0d1485d14a77b95941767_ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser_UserID], [R3_2b3cff0b49a0d1485d14a77b95941767_ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser_Account] FROM dbo.ComplianceComputerWithActiveInventory AS ComplianceComputer -- Filter INNER JOIN #ComplianceComputerAllowed AS filter ON filter.ComplianceComputerID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerID -- Additional joins LEFT OUTER JOIN ComplianceDomain AS cd ON cd.ComplianceDomainID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceDomainID LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupEx AS Location ON ComplianceComputer.LocationID = Location.GroupExID LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupEx AS CorporateStructure ON ComplianceComputer.BusinessUnitID = CorporateStructure.GroupExID LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupEx AS CostCenter ON ComplianceComputer.CostCenterID = CostCenter.GroupExID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ComplianceComputerTypeProperty [EnvironmentT] ON ([EnvironmentT].ComplianceComputerTypeID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerTypeID AND [EnvironmentT].PropertyName = 'Environment') LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ComplianceComputerPropertyValue [EnvironmentV] ON ([EnvironmentV].ComplianceComputerID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerID AND [EnvironmentV].ComplianceComputerTypePropertyID = [EnvironmentT].ComplianceComputerTypePropertyID) LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ComplianceComputerStatusI18N ON ComplianceComputerStatusI18N.ComplianceComputerStatusID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ComplianceComputerTypeI18N ON ComplianceComputerTypeI18N.ComplianceComputerTypeID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ComplianceComputerInventorySourceTypeI18N ON ComplianceComputerInventorySourceTypeI18N.ComplianceComputerInventorySourceTypeID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceComputerInventorySourceTypeID -- Link from Computer to Calculated User LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- Custom view query for users SELECT ComplianceUser.ComplianceUserID AS [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_UserID], [ComplianceUser].SAMAccountName AS [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_Account], ComplianceUser.Email AS [R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_Email] FROM ComplianceUser -- Filter INNER JOIN #ComplianceUserAllowed AS filter ON filter.ComplianceUserID = ComplianceUser.ComplianceUserID -- Additional joins ) AS ComputerToCalculatedUser ON ComputerToCalculatedUser.R3_47dd9020a3e6788f4dc03326e6315a70_ComputerToCalculatedUser_UserID = ComplianceComputer.CalculatedUserID -- Link from Computer to Assigned User LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- Custom view query for users SELECT ComplianceUser.ComplianceUserID AS [R3_89ab5105110ae6c27f20bd79bd7bf388_ComputerToAssignedUser_UserID], [ComplianceUser].SAMAccountName AS [R3_89ab5105110ae6c27f20bd79bd7bf388_ComputerToAssignedUser_Account] FROM ComplianceUser -- Filter INNER JOIN #ComplianceUserAllowed AS filter ON filter.ComplianceUserID = ComplianceUser.ComplianceUserID -- Additional joins ) AS ComputerToAssignedUser ON ComputerToAssignedUser.R3_89ab5105110ae6c27f20bd79bd7bf388_ComputerToAssignedUser_UserID = ComplianceComputer.AssignedUserID -- Link from Computer to Last Logged On User LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- Custom view query for users SELECT ComplianceUser.ComplianceUserID AS [R3_2b3cff0b49a0d1485d14a77b95941767_ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser_UserID], [ComplianceUser].SAMAccountName AS [R3_2b3cff0b49a0d1485d14a77b95941767_ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser_Account] FROM ComplianceUser -- Filter INNER JOIN #ComplianceUserAllowed AS filter ON filter.ComplianceUserID = ComplianceUser.ComplianceUserID -- Additional joins ) AS ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser ON ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser.R3_2b3cff0b49a0d1485d14a77b95941767_ComputerToLastLoggedOnUser_UserID = ComplianceComputer.ComplianceUserID ) AS InstallationToComputer ON InstallationToComputer.R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_ComputerID = InstalledSoftware.ComplianceComputerID -- Link from InstalledSoftware to Application LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- Custom view query for software titles SELECT SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleID AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ApplicationID], SoftwareTitle.FullName AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ApplicationName], ISNULL(Edition.EditionName, '') AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Edition], Product.ProductName AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ProductName], SoftwareTitleClassificationI18N.DefaultValue AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Classification], SoftwareTitleVersion.VersionName AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ApplicationVersion], SoftwareTitlePublisher.PublisherName AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Publisher], (CASE WHEN Apl.CustomSource =0 THEN (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('CustomSource.Local')) WHEN Apl.CustomSource =1 THEN (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('CustomSource.Flexera')) WHEN Apl.CustomSource =2 THEN (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('CustomSource.Extended')) END) AS [R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Source] FROM SoftwareTitle -- Filter INNER JOIN #SoftwareTitleAllowed AS filter ON filter.SoftwareTitleID = SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleID -- Additional joins LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitleEdition AS Edition ON SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleEditionID = Edition.SoftwareTitleEditionID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitleProduct AS Product ON SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleProductID = Product.SoftwareTitleProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitleClassificationI18N ON SoftwareTitleClassificationI18N.SoftwareTitleClassificationID = SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleClassificationID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitleVersion ON SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleVersionID = SoftwareTitleVersion.SoftwareTitleVersionID INNER JOIN SoftwareTitleProduct ON SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleProductID = SoftwareTitleProduct.SoftwareTitleProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitlePublisher ON SoftwareTitleProduct.SoftwareTitlePublisherID = SoftwareTitlePublisher.SoftwareTitlePublisherID LEFT OUTER JOIN ApplicationsList AS Apl ON SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleID = Apl.SoftwareTitleID ) AS InstallationToApplication ON InstallationToApplication.R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_ApplicationID = InstalledSoftware.SoftwareTitleID ) AS results WHERE (@SearchWordCount = 0) OR (@SearchWordCount = ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT words.Word) FROM @SearchWords AS words WHERE ([ApplicationName] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') OR ([ApplicationVersion] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') OR ([ApplicationPublisher] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') OR ([ComputerName] LIKE '%' + words.Word + '%' ESCAPE '\') )) OPTION (RECOMPILE)
Report.SearchMapping:

SelectName="ComplianceComputer.InventoryDate" WhereClause="ComplianceComputer.InventoryDate" FilterGroupType="4" DefaultFilterType="4" ComplianceSearchTypeID="606" Mandatory="false" PrimaryKey="false" SelectByDefault="false" IsCustom="false" LinkIndicateOrigin="false" IsMultiEditEnabled="false" ModifyState="Unchanged" /> <Index>8</Index> <FieldName>R2_5132ea92c263fdba5ec93940f2e3862c_InstallationToComputer_InventoryDate</FieldName> <ShowInGrid>true</ShowInGrid> <Hidden>false</Hidden> <Order>2147483647</Order> <QueryDepth>2</QueryDepth> <ParentName>Computer</ParentName> <RelationName>InstallationToComputer</RelationName> <RelationPath>InstallationToComputer</RelationPath> <MatchOption>Excluded</MatchOption> </CustomViewColumnMapping> <CustomViewColumnMapping> <Column ComplianceSearchTypeColumnID="15130" ColumnName="Computer.Location" ColumnNameResourceName="ComplianceSearchTypeColumn.Location" FromTable="LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupEx AS Location ON ComplianceComputer.LocationID = Location.GroupExID" SelectName="Location.Path" WhereClause="Location.GroupExID" SelectOptionsSQL="SELECT DISTINCT g.GroupExID AS [ID],'' AS ResourceName, g.Path AS DefaultName FROM GroupEx AS g JOIN TableGetAccessibleGroups('CMEnterprise','read') as a ON a.GroupExID = g.GroupExID WHERE a.GroupTypeID = 1 AND g.BusinessView = 0 AND a.UserHasAccess=1 ORDER BY Path" FilterGroupType="5" DefaultFilterType="3" ComplianceSearchTypeID="606" Mandatory="false" PrimaryKey="false" SelectByDefault="false" IsCustom="false" LinkIndicateOrigin="false" IsMultiEditEnabled="false" ModifyState="Unchanged" /> <Index>12</Index> OUTER JOIN SoftwareTitlePublisher ON SoftwareTitleProduct.SoftwareTitlePublisherID = SoftwareTitlePublisher.SoftwareTitlePublisherID" SelectName="SoftwareTitlePublisher.PublisherName" WhereClause="SoftwareTitlePublisher.PublisherName" FilterGroupType="1" DefaultFilterType="1" ComplianceSearchTypeID="604" Mandatory="false" PrimaryKey="false" SelectByDefault="false" IsCustom="false" ColumnName="SoftwareTitle.Source" ColumnNameResourceName="ComplianceSearchTypeColumn.Source" FromTable="LEFT OUTER JOIN ApplicationsList AS Apl ON SoftwareTitle.SoftwareTitleID = Apl.SoftwareTitleID" SelectName="(CASE WHEN Apl.CustomSource =0 THEN (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('CustomSource.Local')) WHEN Apl.CustomSource =1 THEN (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('CustomSource.Flexera')) WHEN Apl.CustomSource =2 THEN (SELECT ResourceValue FROM dbo.GetTranslation('CustomSource.Extended')) END)" WhereClause="Apl.CustomSource" SelectOptionsSQL="SELECT Convert(int,((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ResourceString DESC)-1))) AS ID,ResourceString AS ResourceName ,ResourceValue AS DefaultName FROM ComplianceTranslation WHERE ResourceString LIKE 'CustomSource.%'" FilterGroupType="3" DefaultFilterType="3" ComplianceSearchTypeID="604" Mandatory="false" PrimaryKey="false" SelectByDefault="false" IsCustom="false" LinkIndicateOrigin="false" IsMultiEditEnabled="false" ModifyState="Unchanged" /> <Index>27</Index> <FieldName>R2_51a71253efbabf8e3d6d91e83e042599_InstallationToApplication_Source</FieldName> <ShowInGrid>false</ShowInGrid> <Hidden>false</Hidden> <Order>2147483647</Order> <QueryDepth>2</QueryDepth> <ParentName>SoftwareTitle</ParentName> <RelationName>InstallationToApplication</RelationName> <RelationPath>InstallationToApplication</RelationPath> <MatchOption>Excluded</MatchOption> </CustomViewColumnMapping> </ArrayOfCustomViewColumnMapping>
Report.SearchXML: <customview> <!--Custom view properties--> <name>090.01.01 Detailed Software Inventory</name> <description>Reporting which shows all software installed and where it is installed. Also shows commercial data elements from hardware asset record such as system name and associated physical location, assigned user and their relevant business unit + financials details</description> <schemaVersion>2.0</schemaVersion> <productVersion>13.1.1</productVersion> <!--Master custom view object--> <object name="InstalledSoftware" major="true"> <column index="2" name="InstalledSoftware.ApplicationName" show="true" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="3" name="InstalledSoftware.ApplicationVersion" show="true" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="5" name="InstalledSoftware.ApplicationPublisher" show="true" match="PartialMatch" /> <column index="15" name="InstalledSoftware.IsUsed" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="16" name="InstalledSoftware.LastUsedDate" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="19" name="InstalledSoftware.DiscoveryDate" show="false" match="Excluded" /> <column index="21" name="InstalledSoftware.ComputerName" show="false" match="PartialMatch" /> <!--Linked InstallationToComputer--> <relation name="InstallationToComputer"> <object name="Computer"> <column index="0" name="Computer.ComputerName" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="1" name="Computer.Domain" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="8" name="Computer.InventoryDate" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="12" name="Computer.Location" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="13" name="Computer.CorporateStructure" show="true" match="Excluded" /> <column index="14"
